actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for expenditures for multifuel heating systems.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax credit for expenditures for multifuel heating systems. Defines "multifuel heating systems" as energy efficiency devices designed as wood, coal or other solid fuel add-ons connected to a heating furnace or boiler.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for expenditures for multifuel heating systems.
